rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a counter on it.
Whenever Mistwoods Monstrosity attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a counter on it. Those creatures gain deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]It did not take long for the Henmo to learn they were not the only ones in the Mistwoods.[/i]
